overview: Isla, a island maiden who has all the males, including her father, lusting after her. Her dream was to leave her primitive surroundings and find another life in the big city. However, it would not be easy. To be able to escape, she must use her body to pay off all the men who would help her.
tagline: A child of the island. A girl of innocence. A victim of lust. A woman in need.
title: Isla
